01

Our Partners

In Australia, nearly one in three households have rooftop solar, and large-scale solar farms are rapidly expanding. As systems age or suffer damage, many panels are replaced, creating a growing need for sustainable disposal. Solar panel recycling diverts waste from landfill, prevents harmful chemicals from entering the environment, and recovers valuable materials. These materials can be reused, boosting local manufacturing, improving efficiency, and securing future supply.

02

The future of solar recycling

Sustainable Processing

We have developed world-leading recycling processes that maximise diversion from landfill while minimising environmental impact through highly efficient processing.

What our clients say about our work

I am starting to see more and more systems needing replacement

as older panels fail. It is important to me they are disposed of sustainably, so I work with PV Industries to offer this service to our customers.

Luke Cauchi,
Trill Electrical

The service provided by PV Industries was exceptional.

They explained the solar panel recycling process in detail and helped us to achieve our common goal of reducing waste sent to landfill even taking away the racking and inverters. Well done!

Loani Tierney,
Mosman Council

As a solar installer

we see the solar waste problem from a grassroots level. It is wonderful to see PV industries working towards resolving this issue and doing a great job of it at the same time. The company is driven and highly focused to achieve a sustainable future.

Elliot Lane,
Perfect Solar Power
